text:
confirmed: When your DM is dead/empty and you got a JS error (which breaks the load), you need to remove ONLY the local storage data.
Probably somehow its corrupted (maybe not a JSON valid anymore? or somehow unsaved changes in the DM are breaking it :thinking_face:).

We just confirmed with a mate that was happening to her. (I should have saved previously that data so we can investigate further...)
I can't reproduce myself now :upside_down_face:
